content: crochet a sturdy witch hat with a brim that holds its shape and a crown that stands tall pattern includes six sizes from toddler to adult perfect for halloween costumes or dress-up fun bring some spooky fun to your crochet this season with the **halloween witch hat crochet pattern** this easy top-down design is worked in rounds with 2 strands of medium weight yarn held together i used red heart with love and a 5 mm h hook the sturdy brim keeps its shape and the tall crown stands upright without folding over the free pattern includes **six sizes** toddler 12 24 months small child 3 5 years child 6 10 years teen / adult small adult medium adult large quick to make and fun to wear this witch hat is perfect for costumes dress-up or festive halloween fun don t forget to add your project page and share your finished hat here on ravelry **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **♥** rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
